price: Peygamber, (onlara) dedi ki: “Rabbim yerdeki ve gökteki her sözü bilir. O, hakkıyla işitendir, hakkıyla bilendir.''
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbī yaʿlamu al-qawla fī al-samāi wal-arḍi wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
